member.name: Ge Zhang
member.bio: Ge Zhang is a senior undergraduate student at Peking University. Her research interests are in data mining and human-computer interaction, with a focus on scientific reproducibility and data science collaboration.

member.name: Wenjia Hu
member.bio: Wenjia just got her BA in Cognitive Science from Lawrence University. She is passionate about collective intelligence and tools for thoughts. Her research interest lies in the intersection of complexity science and HCI. She is also a UX researcher, and teaches kids design thinking on the side.

member.name: Emelia May Hughes
member.bio: Emelia Hughes is an undergraduate student at the University of Washington studying Informatics and Drawing & Painting. Her research interests are in human-computer interaction, and she is currently focusing on the UX surrounding credibility.

member.name: Ricky Grannis-Vu
member.bio: Ricky Grannis-Vu is an undergraduate student at Stanford University. He studies the design and governance of online communities, with a focus on the PolicyKit project. He also works as an instructor, curriculum designer, and program manager at Inspirit AI.
